body:
Saint Abraham (Ethiopian)

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Abraham
Saint
Venerated in Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church
Feast May 5

Abraham is a saint of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church . His feast day is celebrated May 5.

References [ edit ]

Sources [ edit ]

  • Holweck, F. G. A Biographical Dictionary of the Saints . St. Louis, MO: B. Herder Book Co. 1924.

September

  • Daysa the Egyptian (12th)

  • Absadi (27th)

  • Sharda Hawaryat (1st)
  • Matlan the physician (4th)

  • Lawa-Krestos (5th)
  • Basalota Mika’el (5th)
  • ‘Oyoranos (5th)
  • ‘Abtlemanos of Shoka (7th)
  • Abuna Aregawi (24th)
  • Ezana (1st)
  • Saizana (1st)
